SELECT sr.*, ( CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(sur.id) FROM user_role sur WHERE sur.role_id = sr.role_id ) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END) AS isRelatedSysUser, ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(srp.id) FROM role_menu srp WHERE srp.role_id = sr.role_id ) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END ) AS isRelatedSysMenu FROM role_case sr WHERE 1 = 1
AND sr.role_name LIKE '%${filter.name}%'
ORDER BY sr.creation_time DESC
